A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went in with an open mind\, and even gave it a second shot.  But\, terribly disappointed.  The unneeded millennial comedy\, and disregard for what made the series close to so many hearts\, is very disappointing.  Rouge One had given me hope that the series was back on track\, but now we are back to The Phantom Menace level.   If they wanted to make a Guardians of the Galaxy knock off they did a good job.
